title: The Windfarmer: A Sci-Fi Dramedy of the Nearish Future
description: Jase Logan is a mid-level HR executive going through the motions among the canals of Manhattan when heâ€™s tasked to retrieve a fugitive windfarmer, sending him on a series of misadventures through the disparate nations of the former United States.  A power-mad CEO and an enterprising Appalachian terrorist will do their best to destroy him, but with luck, the kindness of strangers, and the loyalty of what friends he has left, Jase Logan might blunder his way into making the world a better place.
author: Chris Wichtendahl
